extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 2 or above or 6.0 units at the 100 level in RELS.
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from RELS 254/6.0; RELS 259/3.0

basic.description: The status and roles of women in selected religious traditions; impact of feminism on the study of religion.
basic.subject: RELS
basic.title: Women in Religious Traditions
